item.title: Creating a development environment of Node.js (Use Express and VS Code)
item.description: This article explains how to create a development environment of Node.js (Use Express) including a function of hot reload. (VS Code) The following lists are the table of contents about this article. Target audience Environment Preconditions Creating the development environment Make project directory Install Express Install Create a environment for test Install Nodemon globally Install Make a setting file Make and edit launch.json Edit package.
